name: Grande Soy Wax Candles
description:
Cannot get enough of our candles? Here's our Grande soy wax candles, 3 times the size of our usual hexagon jar candles. These Grande candles are double wicked, for more OOMPH!
Our candles are beautifully scented, burns clean and long lasting. Vegan friendly too! 
Fragrances used are phthalate free. 

Tips: Keep your wicks trimmed to 1/4 inch for optimal burning. 

All time bestsellers:
-Fresh Linen
-Maychang & Lemongrass
-Lavender Luxury 

Scent description:

1) Mahagony :
Smells very similar to BBW's Mahagony Teakwood. Sexy citrus top notes and musky base notes. A clear favorite with both men and women. 

2) Bay Rum:
Woody spicy scent with notes of cloves, cinnamon and sweet orange. Perfect for cool, cuddly sexy evenings!

3) Patchouli Angels:
For patchouli lovers, this is for you. A complex blend of patchouli, florals and hints of spicy notes. 

4) Balsam Pine: **SOLD OUT**
If you love the smell of real pine trees during Christmas, this is surely for you.

5) Honey Vanilla: **SOLD OUT**
Smells just like L*sh "Soft Coeur", rich chocolate and vanilla scent for serious dessert lovers.

6) Madagascar Vanilla:
A beautiful vanilla scent with hints of amber and florals. A gorgeous, balanced scent.

7) Gingersnap Cookies: **SOLD OUT**
Freshly baked gingersnap cookies, need we say more? 

8) Apple Mango Tango:
A perfect blend of fresh apples, pears and lilies in a bottle. Deliciously fresh scent.

9) Bumbleberries:
A surprise for the nose. Delicious ripened berries with very subtle hints of floral and musk to round up the scent perfectly.

10) Strawberry Delight: 
Strawberries with a vengeance, should we say about this one. Delicious!

11) Yummy:
Smells like L*sh Yummy Yummy Yummy. A medley of fresh fruits in a basket.

12) Mulberry:
Fancy a punnet of delicious mulberries? 

13) Fresh Linen:
OUR BESTSELLER! Fresh clean linen on the line. Gorgeous floral scent set to please the masses.

14) Luxury Lavender: 
A sweeter lavender scent that calms and soothes. Our customers actually prefer this compared to straight lavender essential oil scent. 

15) Twilight:
For Twilight fans, this is seriously sexy floral without being overpowering. Attract your Edward or Jacob now!

16) Mocha:
Fancy a cuppa? Our mocha scented candles are creamy and deliciously addictive.

17) Maychang Lemongrass:
Another BESTSELLER! A well balanced, all essential oils blend. A seriously beautiful scent that will transport your senses to the spa in Bali. 

18) Energizing:
An essential oil and fragrance oil blend with notes of mint and subtle citrus notes. 

19) Relaxing: 
An essential oil and fragrance blend with notes of lavender, jasmine kissed with hints of musk.

20) Hugo:
A very manly scent.  A musky blend of amber, oak and cedar with slightly uplifting notes of mandarin.

21) Cottony Clean:
Smells like clean laundry or the very expensive 'Clean' perfume. Smells fresh just like laundry day!

22) Honeysuckle:
A gorgeous blend of lilac, jasmine and rose. Perfect for ultra floral lovers.

23) Coconut Vanilla:
Love beach holidays? This scent is a well balanced sweet coconut and hints of floral for that perfect beach holiday scent. 

24) Satsuma: **SOLD OUT**
Juicy mandarins, mangoes, oranges and peaches in a bottle. Delish! 

25) Gold:
A very luxurious spicy scent with a very unique dark chocolate note. A blend of patchouli, neroli sandalwood, mandarin and other lush essential oils. This fragrance is a blend of both essential and fragrance oils. For deep, spicy scent lovers.

27) Black Raspberry Vanilla:
A bright juicy blend of blackberries and raspberries with subtle hints of vanilla. 

28) Fruity Loops:
Bring your inner child out with this scent. Sweet lemon, grapefruit and sugar vanilla with every sniff!


Approximate size : 13.5oz

name: 4.5oz Soy Wax Hexagon Jar Candles

name: Christmas Special - Medium Gift Boxed Sets
description:
The Yuletide season is drawing near and we are offering our ever so popular signature Boxed Sets!

Each gift box comes ready for gift giving for your friends and loved ones. Choose your box of choice filled with assorted goodies. 

**Orders of 2 and more, we will be using Ta-Q-Bin courier service so as to maintain the shape of boxes and keep shipping rates low. 

Choices of boxed sets:

Set 1:
1) 2 x gingerbread boys
2) 3 x mini soap cupcakes
3) 1 x mini peppermint candy soap bar

Set 2:
1) 2 x mini 2 oz soy wax candle (Christmas scented, of course!)
2) 1 x mini peppermint candy soap bar
3) 3 x mini soap cupcakes

Set 3: 
1) 1 x 4.5oz soy wax candle (Maychang Lemongrass)
2) 2 x mini Maychang Lemongrass soap bar
3) 1 x dead sea & epsom salt foot soak 

Set 4:
1) 2 x snowmen/snowlady soap
2) 1 x snowflake soap
3) 3 x mini soap cupcake soap

Set 5:
1) 1 x large soap cupcake 
2) 3 mini soap cupcakes
3) 2 x mini peppermint bark soap

name: Lemongrass Spa Gift Set
description:
Perfect for birthdays, housewarmings, anniversaries and even for the upcoming Yuletide Season! 

Each set will consist of :

1) 6 spa soaps scented in lemongrass and maychang essential oils with calendula flowers.
2) Dead sea & epsom salt foot soak scented in lemongrass essential oils. 
3) High quality washcloth.
4) Mini 2oz soy wax candle scented in maychang & lemongrass essential oils.

**Each set is vegan friendly. 
    Soaps weigh at least 100g each.
    Gift baskets will be sent via Ta-Q-Bin Courier.
    
***Images may vary with actual product due to its handmade      nature.

name: Lemongrass & Maychang
description:
An all time favorite with both men and women. Made with purely essential oils and wholesome goodness of calendula flower petals scattered within the soap. 

Ingredients: Saponified blend of coconut, palm, safflower, glycerine (of vegetable origin), purified water, sorbitol, sorbitan oleate, soybean protein, titanium dioxide and essential oils. 

Approximate weight: 100g

name: Soap Roses
description:
Beautiful soap roses perfect for any occasion. Pick your favorite scents in the dropdown menu. Or drop us an email/PM for more options.

Ingredients: Saponified blend of coconut, palm, safflower, glycerine (of vegetable origin), purified water, sorbitol, sorbitan oleate, soybean protein, titanium dioxide, micas and fragrance oils. 

Approximate weight: 110g

name: Lavender Luxury
description:
If you love lavender, this is for you. A gorgeous floral soap with notes of lily of the valley, hints of herbs such as eucalyptus, French lavender, Italian bergamot and clary sage. One to use before you sleep for relaxation after a long day at work. 

Ingredients: Saponified blend of coconut, palm, safflower, glycerine (of vegetable origin), purified water, sorbitol, sorbitan oleate, soybean protein,titanium dioxide, micas, skin safe fragrance and colorants.

Approximate weight: 100g

name: Splash
description:
Our version of 'Cool Water' is the perfect men's fragrance, this crisp fresh scent is surprisingly also adored by women. Top notes consisting of citrus, black currant and pineapple. The middle notes are honeydew, muguet and water lily and the base of the fragrance is vetiver amber and mulberry.

Each slice is approximately 110g

Ingredients: Saponified blend of coconut, palm, safflower, glycerine (of vegetable origin), purified water, sorbitol, sorbitan oleate, soybean protein, titanium dioxide, micas and fragrance oils.

name: Draqqar
description:
This is a duplication of the popular men's scent. Very masculine scent with notes of spicy berries, citrus, lavender and amber. This soap is colored with activated charcoal

Ingredients: Saponified blend of coconut, palm, safflower, glycerine (of vegetable origin), purified water, sorbitol, sorbitan oleate, soybean protein, titanium dioxide, activated charcoal and fragrance oils. 

Approximate weight: 100g

name: Solid Perfumes
description:
No alcohol and made with natural ingredients. No worries of spilling or toting around heavy perfume bottles in your purse. Just dab on your warmest areas of the body eg. the wrists, back of the ears and the inner elbows to freshen up. This solid perfume doubles up as a cuticle balm too! 

Comes in various scents, we have a pretty extensive range!

Each pot contains approximately 0.5oz of product.

name: Lovespell
description:
Our popular version of Victoria's Secret perfume is back with a new image and formulation! With added unrefined shea butter, be sure that your skin will be left more moisturized than using commercial soaps! A beautiful fruity floral scent that has won hearts (and showers) of many.

Ingredients: Saponified blend of coconut, palm, safflower, glycerine (of vegetable origin), purified water, sorbitol, sorbitan oleate, soybean protein,titanium dioxide, micas, skin safe fragrance and colorants.

Approximate weight: 100g

name: Unsweetened Lip Balms
description:
Available in Juicy watermelon, Orange, Frozen Margarita (lime), Mango, Passionfruit Rose, Peppermint, Cotton Candy and Unicorn Farts (blend of peppermint & cotton candy).

Unsweetened, uncolored lip balms made from luxurious ingredients that will leave your lips moisturized and doesn’t leave any waxy residue. Say goodbye to sticky waxy lip balms.

Ingredients: coconut oil, bees wax, organic shea butter, organic cocoa butter, tocopherol (vitamin e).

name: Passionfruit & Mango Body Custard
description:
A rich moisturizer made with nourishing oils and butters for your skin. Contains shea butter, cocoa butter, sweet almond oil, lanolin, vegetable glycerin and mango butter

Our body custard is free of sulfates, propylene glycol, DEA and artificial colour. 

Each pot weighs approximately XXgrams

name: Pineapple Orchid
description:
A gorgeous sweet pineapple and black currents scent with notes of violet and orchids. A popular seller here! 

Ingredients: Saponified blend of coconut, palm, safflower, glycerine (of vegetable origin), purified water, sorbitol, sorbitan oleate, soybean protein, titanium dioxide, micas, skin safe fragrance and colorants.

Approximate weight: 100g
